newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela arrests German for cocaine smuggling.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela arrests German for cocaine smuggling.

text.p: Venezuelan authorities on the Caribbean island Margarita arrested a middle-aged German man on suspicion of attempting to smuggle 13.5 pounds (6 kg) of cocaine to Europe, El Nacional paper reported.
The man, named as Erwin Boing, 47, was carrying the drugs in his luggage and was stopped by security agents as he prepared to board a flight to Amsterdam on Tuesday.

Authorities on Margarita island, a popular tourist destination just of Venezuela's northeast coast, frequently catch foreigners attempting to smuggle small amounts of cocaine to Europe and North America.
